official.headline: Council Steps Up Coordination
official.anchor_line: Council factions are working diligently to address recent fluctuations in the Behavioral Compliance Index and ensure continuous access to essential city services.
official.contextual_reframing: Temporary adjustments demonstrate the system’s capacity to adapt, maintaining Stenograd’s commitment to fairness and efficiency for all residents.

underground.headline: System Chaos Exposed
underground.anchor_line: Council infighting leaves BCI broken—locks out thousands, while the powerful scramble for control.
underground.contextual_reframing: No answers from above. Unstable scoring rules our lives—rumors says server rooms are in lockdown and engineers are blocked. How much more can Stenograd take?
